response: narrative=Lynn's vehicle was found abandoned at Hall Road, Rhu, linked to an organized protest with colleagues nearby.

narrative=Lynn Weston was last seen at an arcade by her friend, Gillian Wilson. After leaving the arcade, she was believed to have visited a nearby playground. Concerns escalated when Lynn did not return home, prompting a search that led to 55 Diana Avenue, Glasgow, G13 3JW. Police traced her to this location, where she was found safe and unharmed.
